Design

items.title: Introduction to Creature Sculpting In Zbrush
items.headline: Learn from start to finish how create and sculpt your own creature
objectives_summary: The student will learn the basic tools of Zbrush and how to navigate inside the program. They will also learn how to build their own model from scratch in Zbrush using a variety of techniques that they can apply to modeling their own creations. They will also learn how to then take the finished Zbrush asset and use it in other programs for rendering a completed, full color, piece of art to present.

items.title: Modeling A Realistic Sport Shoes In Zbrush
items.headline: using live boolean, zmodeler brush, and other modeling technique to creating a realistic sport shoes in zbrush 2019
objectives_summary: zbrush modeling and sculpting technique

items.headline: Learn how to create Architectural Multi-floor Building Structure with Foundation Columns and Beams
objectives_summary: How to use Grasshopper
How to create Parametric Designs
How to create a Parametric Building Structure

items.headline: Learn the Essentials in Adobe After Effects CC + Motion Graphic in this Beginners Animation + Motion Design Course
objectives_summary: You learn the basics of Adobe After Effects CC in this course
You will learn the essentials such as composition, key framing, masks and much more
You will learn how to render and export your final video to a standard file format to share with the world!
